title: Chest Commands该给玩家哪些权限？
author: moline
txt_content:
[综合|管理][汉化|教程][重大更新!]Chest Commands——RPG/小游戏必备插件![1.5-1.7] http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-183229-1-1.html 我给了玩家

    - chestcommands.command.open.main-menu.yml     - chestcommands.command.open.shop.yml     - chestcommands.open.filename.yml     - chestcommands.item.filename.yml

复制代码 这几个权限，第一个和第二个是开启菜单的权限，第三个是菜单内打开其他才打的权限，第四个是用物品打开的权限，我哪里弄错了？ menu-settings: name: '&c服务器&d菜单' rows: 4 open-sound: NOTE_PLING open-with-item: item-id: 347 left-click: true right-click: true复制代码

replies.author: Smaoll
replies.txt_content:
- chestcommands.command.open.main-menu.yml
    - chestcommands.command.open.shop.yml
    - chestcommands.item.main-menu.yml复制代码

加这些权限。

replies.author: moline
replies.txt_content: 开服之前出现这个问题，妈蛋，在OP的时候测试没事

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: chestcommands.item.【这个是你XXX.yml名称没弄错吧】
